posts.title: ADA Compliance for Websites: A Small Business Guide
posts.description: Website accessibility isn’t just about doing the right thing — it protects your business and helps you reach more customers. With legal pressure rising and accessibility standards evolving, small businesses can’t afford to ignore ADA compliance. This guide covers the essentials you need to know.
posts.author: Digital Allies
posts.excerpt: Website accessibility isn’t just about doing the right thing — it protects your business and helps you reach more customers. With legal pressure rising and accessibility standards evolving, small businesses can’t afford to ignore ADA compliance.

posts.title: Is It Time for a New Website? 5 Signs Your Small Business Needs a Redesign (And How to Get Started)
posts.description: Learn the five warning signs that your small business website needs a redesign and get practical steps to start the project with confidence.
posts.author: Digital Allies
